# SeamlessFlow.ai

> Cannabis dispensary SEO, AI automation, and marketing agency based in NYC. We help licensed dispensaries rank #1 on Google Maps, deploy AI budtender chatbots, automate Metrc compliance, and build high-converting websites.

## Services

### Dispensary Local SEO
We optimize Google Business Profiles, build cannabis-friendly citations, and use geo-grid ranking technology to track visibility across entire delivery zones. Most dispensaries see ranking improvements within 30-60 days. Starting at $497/month with no contracts.

### AI Budtender Chatbot
A 24/7 AI-powered chatbot trained on your dispensary's menu, strain inventory, and local regulations. Recommends products based on desired effects (relaxation, pain relief, energy), handles age verification, and pre-qualifies delivery orders. Integrates with Dutchie, Jane, and Weedmaps.

### Metrc Compliance Automation
Automated seed-to-sale tracking that connects your POS system with Metrc. Handles package reporting, transfer manifests, inventory reconciliation, and compliance alerts. Prevents costly violations and saves hours of manual data entry.

### Dispensary Website Development
Mobile-first, SEO-optimized websites built specifically for cannabis businesses. Includes online menu integration, age-gate verification, schema markup for rich search results, and Core Web Vitals optimization. 30-day build timeline.

### Google Business Profile Optimization
Complete GBP setup and optimization including category selection, service area configuration, post scheduling, review generation strategy, and Q&A management. Focused on cannabis-specific local search visibility.

## Coverage Areas
- **New York:** Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Bronx, Albany, Syracuse, Rochester
- **New Jersey:** Jersey City, Newark, Hoboken
- **Connecticut:** Hartford, New Haven, Stamford
- **Massachusetts:** Boston, Worcester, Springfield

## Key Facts
- NYC-based agency specializing exclusively in licensed cannabis businesses
- No long-term contracts â€” month-to-month services, cancel anytime
- 30-day results guarantee on all SEO packages
- Uses geo-grid ranking reports (Local Falcon) for transparent performance tracking
- AI-first approach: budtender chatbots, compliance automation, marketing workflows
- Starting at $497/month for single-location dispensaries
